title: Ava Labs Launches Avalanche Arcad3 to Help Game Studios Enter Web3
description: Avalanche Arcad3 is connecting traditional game publishers with crypto firms to help bring legacy IP into the fledgling Web3 gaming space.

title: Alchemy Pay Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is ACH Crypto a Good Investment?

title: Binance CEO warns employees about leaked chats
description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ) has reportedly cautioned Binance employees about the importance of their internal communications, following a lawsuit filed by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) earlier this week. This move comes in response to the SEC’s release of chat logs between Binance employees, which have raised concerns regarding the company’s compliance ... Read more

title: BitGo signals interest in acquiring Prime Trust
description: Digital asset custodian BitGo has revealed its intention to acquire fintech infrastructure provider Prime Trust, as per an announcement made on June 8. The non-binding letter of intent sets the stage for BitGo’s acquisition of Prime Trust’s payment rails and cryptocurrency IRA fund, which will enhance BitGo’s wealth management offerings. However, specific details regarding the ... Read more

title: Former SEC Official Tells Investors To ‘Get Out of Crypto Platforms Now’, Says Regulatory Siege Will Continue
description:
A former high-ranking official at the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) thinks digital asset investors should “get out of crypto platforms now.” John Reed Stark, who founded the SEC’s Office of Internet Enforcement and spent 11 years as its chief, says crypto exchanges are under “a US regulatory/law enforcement siege which has only just […]

The post Former SEC Official Tells Investors To ‘Get Out of Crypto Platforms Now’, Says Regulatory Siege Will Continue appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: Binance.US Halts US Dollar Deposits Over Banking Challenges, Says It Will Temporarily Be a Crypto-Only Exchange
description:
Binance.US says that it will be halting US dollar deposits and withdrawals in response to being sued by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). In a new announcement, Binance.US says it will temporarily become a crypto-only exchange platform due to the SEC’s “ideological campaign” against the US digital asset industry. “The SEC has taken […]

The post Binance.US Halts US Dollar Deposits Over Banking Challenges, Says It Will Temporarily Be a Crypto-Only Exchange appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
